data.title: Yearly & Monthly weather
data.meta_description: Bridal Veil, Oregon, USA - Climate and weather forecast by month. Detailed climate information with charts - average monthly weather with temperature, pressure, humidity, precipitation, wind, daylight, sunshine, visibility, and UV index data. In Bridal Veil, during the entire year, snow falls for 6.3 days and aggregates up to 4.37" (111mm) of snow. The month with the least rainfall is July, when the rain falls for 4.9 days and typically collects 0.31" (8mm) of precipitation.
data.text:
Average temperature

Bridal Veil, OR

The warmest month (with the highest average high temperature) is August (79.7째F).

The month with the lowest average high temperature is December (43.3째F).

The month with the highest average low temperature is August (52.7째F).

The coldest month (with the lowest average low temperature) is December (33.3째F).

Average snowfall

Bridal Veil, OR

The month with the highest snowfall is February (1.54").

The months with the least snowfall are April, May, June, July, August, September and October (0").

Average snowfall days

Bridal Veil, OR

The month with the highest number of snowfall days is February (2.2 days).

The months with the least snowfall days are April, May, June, July, August, September and October (0 days).

Average daylight / Average sunshine

Bridal Veil, OR

The month with the longest days is June (Average daylight: 15h and 36min).

The month with the shortest days is December (Average daylight: 8h and 48min).

The month with the most sunshine is August (Average sunshine: 11h and 0min).

The month with the least sunshine is February (Average sunshine: 4h and 6min).

Average UV index

Bridal Veil, OR

The month with the highest UV index is July (UV index 6).

The months with the lowest UV index are January, February, November and December (UV index 2).

Average visibility

Bridal Veil, OR

The months with the highest visibility are July, August and September (6mi).

The months with the lowest visibility are January, February, March, April, May, June, October, November and December (5mi).
